name: Monkey GO Happy Top Ten Games
name_original: Monkey GO Happy Top Ten Games
description:
10 different Monkey GO Happy story games have been compiled into one app for your enjoyment.

The List includes:
- Monkey GO Happy Adventure
- Monkey GO Happy Leprechauns
- Monkey GO Happy Valentines
- Monkey GO Happy North Pole
- Monkey GO Happy Turkeys
- Monkey GO Happy Candy
- Monkey GO Happy Halloween
- Monkey GO Happy Talisman
- Monkey GO Happy Easter
- Monkey GO Happy Eggs

Features:
- over 10 beautifully designed long story stages
- 30 Hats to dress up your monkey
- 7 different monkeys to choose from
- NO In-app purchases
- Automatic save progress

Instructions: Tap on objects and locations on the screen. Drag items to specific spots to solve puzzles and more!
